name: R.A.I.D.
description: R.A.I.D. is an extremely realistic, tactical, and stealth based Battle Royale game. Throughout each last man standing, the player may experience multiple detailed levels, clean as well as dynamic first-person gameplay, and an overall seamless, beautiful experience. We are developing this project purely based on community feedback and what the players want. Each level will be uniquely crafted and nearly completed before public testing. There will be no content-driven or paid DLC/Microtransactions within this project, period.
